participant_1.background:
I try to stay active and eat healthy to make myself feel younger.
I listen to my favorite bands to relax when I'm not at work.
my parents are not married anymore.
I am a hard worker who is always looking for ways to improve myself.
There are quite a few of us, but we all get along.

participant_2.background:
I sometimes forget to water my plants, but I'm trying to be better about it.
I remember spending hours in my room reading books while my dad worked.
I'm not worried about the weather because I have to be ready for any condition when I fly.
My car is a convertible, so I can enjoy the sun and the wind in my hair while listening to my favorite music.
I'm afraid of not being able to make my juicing bar a success.

content.text: I'm doing good, thanks. It's a nice day out, isn't it?
It sure is! I love the sun.
Me too. I like to go out and enjoy it when I can.
I do too. When the weather's nice, I love to spend time in my garden.
That's nice. I've been meaning to get into gardening, but I just haven't had the time.
It's never too late to start! It's a lot of fun and it's really rewarding to see your plants grow.
I know, I know. I've been meaning to do it for a while.
You should! I'll give you some pointers if you want.
No problem! I'm always happy to help.
